name: misquotation
content:

the act of misquoting someone (= repeating what they say in a way that is not accurate), or an example of this: That was a deliberate misquotation of what I said. The company removed the document with the misquotation from its website. See
misquote
More examplesFewer examplesThe book collects hundreds of celebrated misquotations.As a journalist, I disapprove of selective misquotation. Putting the exchange in writing puts it on the record so no one can claim misquotation.
